name: Jeep Meridian
description: The price of Jeep Meridian, a 7 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 33.60  - 39.66 Lakh. It is available in 7 variants, with an engine of 1956 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Meridian comes with 6 airbags. Jeep Meridian has a ground clearance of 214 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 11.5 kmpl for Meridian.
